sense.def: Alternative Names She pan luo li 蛇盤瘰癧 , snake-coil scrofula with pervasion-illness Pathological Condition of numerous luo li 瘰癧 , scrofula with pervasion-illness, growing around the neck. Shi yi de xiao fang 世醫得效方 19: 海菜丸，治癧生於頭項上交接，名蛇盤癧者，宜早治 之 , “Pills with hai cai . They cure scrofula developing at the intersection of the head and nape. Those called ‘ snake - coil pervasion - illness ’ are to be treated early”.
